unit.decl_stmt: AVCodec ff_mace3_decoder = { .name = "mace3", .long_name = NULL_IF_CONFIG_SMALL("MACE (Macintosh Audio Compression/Expansion) 3:1"), .type = AVMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO, .id = AV_CODEC_ID_MACE3, .priv_data_size = sizeof(MACEContext), .init = mace_decode_init, .decode = mace_decode_frame, .capabilities = AV_CODEC_CAP_DR1, .sample_fmts = (const enum AVSampleFormat[]) { AV_SAMPLE_FMT_S16P, AV_SAMPLE_FMT_NONE }, };

AVCodec ff_mace6_decoder = { .name = "mace6", .long_name = NULL_IF_CONFIG_SMALL("MACE (Macintosh Audio Compression/Expansion) 6:1"), .type = AVMEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO, .id = AV_CODEC_ID_MACE6, .priv_data_size = sizeof(MACEContext), .init = mace_decode_init, .decode = mace_decode_frame, .capabilities = AV_CODEC_CAP_DR1, .sample_fmts = (const enum AVSampleFormat[]) { AV_SAMPLE_FMT_S16P, AV_SAMPLE_FMT_NONE }, };
